description: Historical Bezirke of Berlin 1946-1989 with temporal existence

metadata.notes: East Berlin had 8 original + 3 new districts; West Berlin maintained 12 stable districts

bezirke.name: Mitte
bezirke.administrative_notes: Original 1920 district, Soviet sector. Central administrative district.

bezirke.name: Prenzlauer Berg
bezirke.administrative_notes: Original 1920 district, Soviet sector.

bezirke.name: Friedrichshain
bezirke.administrative_notes: Original 1920 district, Soviet sector.

bezirke.name: Pankow
bezirke.administrative_notes: Original 1920 district, Soviet sector. Lost 3 Ortsteil to Weißensee in 1986.

bezirke.name: Weißensee
bezirke.administrative_notes: Original 1920 district, Soviet sector. Lost territory to Marzahn (1979) and Hohenschönhausen (1985), gained from Pankow (1986).

bezirke.name: Lichtenberg
bezirke.administrative_notes: Original 1920 district, Soviet sector. Lost significant territory to create Marzahn (1979).

bezirke.name: Treptow
bezirke.administrative_notes: Original 1920 district, Soviet sector.

bezirke.name: Köpenick
bezirke.administrative_notes: Original 1920 district, Soviet sector.

bezirke.name: Marzahn
bezirke.administrative_notes: First new district since 1920. Created for massive Plattenbau housing development. Lost territory to Hellersdorf (1986).

bezirke.name: Hohenschönhausen
bezirke.administrative_notes: Created during major housing construction. Included both historic villages and new Plattenbau estates.

bezirke.name: Hellersdorf
bezirke.administrative_notes: Final new district created due to continued housing development pressure.

bezirke.name: Charlottenburg
bezirke.administrative_notes: Original 1920 district, British sector. No boundary changes.

bezirke.name: Kreuzberg
bezirke.administrative_notes: Original 1920 district, American sector. No boundary changes.

bezirke.name: Neukölln
bezirke.administrative_notes: Original 1920 district, American sector. No boundary changes.

bezirke.name: Reinickendorf
bezirke.administrative_notes: Original 1920 district, French sector. No boundary changes.

bezirke.name: Schöneberg
bezirke.administrative_notes: Original 1920 district, American sector. No boundary changes.

bezirke.name: Spandau
bezirke.administrative_notes: Original 1920 district, British sector. Only West Berlin district affected by territorial change (Western Staaken 1945-1951).

bezirke.name: Steglitz
bezirke.administrative_notes: Original 1920 district, American sector. No boundary changes.

bezirke.name: Tempelhof
bezirke.administrative_notes: Original 1920 district, American sector. No boundary changes.

bezirke.name: Tiergarten
bezirke.administrative_notes: Original 1920 district, British sector. No boundary changes.

bezirke.name: Wedding
bezirke.administrative_notes: Original 1920 district, French sector. No boundary changes.

bezirke.name: Wilmersdorf
bezirke.administrative_notes: Original 1920 district, British sector. No boundary changes.

bezirke.name: Zehlendorf
bezirke.administrative_notes: Original 1920 district, American sector. No boundary changes.
